original_text: Now the rest of the deeds of Amaziah, are they not written in the Book of the Chronicles of the Kings of Judah?
korean_text: 아마샤의 남은 행적은 유다 왕 역대지략에 기록되지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: Now the rest of the deeds of Amaziah,
are they not written in the Book of the Chronicles of the Kings of Judah?
sentences.korean_translation: 유다 왕들의 역대지략 책에 기록되어 있지 않은가?
